word: "In his temple doth everyone speak of his glory" (Psalm 29:9), and the song which the ransomed ones will sing . . . will declare the glory of God: "Great and marvelous are thy works, O Lord God, the Almighty; righteous and true are thy ways, thou King of the ages. Who shall not fear, O Lord, and glorify thy name? for thou only art holy" (Revelation 15:3, 4, R.V.).
